mapper.update: update zj_wallet set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_type = #{fundType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, freeze = #{freeze,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, fund_type, balance, freeze, create_time, update_time from zj_wallet
